scripts.prepare: bash -c '[ ! -d ./layers/base/.nuxt ] && pnpm run --parallel dev:prepare || true' && bash -c '[ ! -f ./shared/localhost/localhost.pem ] && pnpm run workspace:generate-certs || true'
scripts.workspace:generate-certs: command -v mkcert && cd ./shared/localhost && mkcert -install && mkcert -cert-file localhost.pem -key-file localhost-key.pem localhost 127.0.0.1 ::1
